forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. West southwest wind around 3 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere unfolds under a bright, sunny sky where the chill of winter lingers gently yet defiantly. As the sun climbs, the temperature will hover comfortably around sixty degrees, whispering of a day that prefers to be spent outside. The clarity of the air is remarkable, catching the eye with crisp contours of the skyline and the distant hills, a tableau painted in warm hues under the gentle embrace of a light northwest wind. There is barely a hint of fog, a few wisps lingering along the bay, but the marine layer seems to have retreated for now, offering a stunning view of the Golden Gate.

As evening approaches, the clarity will yield to patches of clouds, inviting a calm and cool transition to a night expected around forty-six degrees. For today’s outing, a light jacket will suffice, possibly layered over a cozy sweater to fend off any late afternoon chill. Consider a leisurely stroll through the nearby parks or a quiet moment in one of the local cafés, soaking in the pleasant ambiance that this sunny day presents. Enjoy the small pleasures that the city has to offer, finding joy in the simple act of observing the ever-changing landscape.
